scripts.deploy:goerli: forge script src/script/GoerliDeployment.s.sol:GoerliDeployment --rpc-url $(grep GOERLI_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv
scripts.deploy:mainnet: forge script src/script/MainnetDeployment.s.sol:MainnetDeployment --rpc-url $(grep MAINNET_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY_MAINNET .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --broadcast --slow --verify --skip-simulation --with-gas-price=300000000 --etherscan-api-key $(grep ETHERSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: forge script src/script/CamelotDeployment.s.sol:CamelotDeployment --rpc-url $(grep ARBITRUM_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY_MAINNET .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ARBISCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv
scripts.deploy:collector: forge script src/script/CollectorDeployment.s.sol:CollectorDeployment --rpc-url $(grep ARBITRUM_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY_MAINNET .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep ARBISCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv
scripts.deploy:quick: forge script src/script/QuickSwapDeployment.s.sol:QuickSwapDeployment --rpc-url $(grep POLYGON_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY_POLYGON .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep POLYGONSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) -vvvv
scripts.deploy:moonbeamstart: forge script src/script/MoonBeamInitialDeployment.s.sol:MoonBeamDeploymentA --rpc-url $(grep MOONBEAM_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY_POLYGON .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep MOONSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --with-gas-price 500000000000 -vvvv
scripts.deploy:moonbeam: forge script src/script/MoonBeamDeployment.s.sol:MoonBeamDeploymentB --rpc-url $(grep MOONBEAM_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY_POLYGON .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep MOONSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --with-gas-price 500000000000 -vvvv
scripts.deploy:moonbeamcollector: forge script src/script/CollectorDeploymentMoonBeam.s.sol:MoonBeamDeploymentC --rpc-url $(grep MOONBEAM_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY_POLYGON .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --broadcast --slow --verify --etherscan-api-key $(grep MOONSCAN_API_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --with-gas-price 500000000000 -vvvv
